snippet.title: Ys X: Nordics Promo Trailer
snippet.description:
The story unfolds in the northern sea Obelia Bay, a bay filled with countless islands of all sizes...
Ys X: Nordics, the long-awaited latest installment commemorating the 35th anniversary of the Ys series, is coming to multiple platforms on September 28!

The Ys IX battle system has undergone a major overhaul!
The all-new “Cross Action” system allows players to fight in two modes: a speedy solo mode in which the player controls gameplay supported by a partner who attacks automatically; and a dual mode in which two players simultaneously control a series of actions to engage in a turn-based battle against a powerful enemy!

Along with the Standard Edition, a Digital Deluxe and an exclusive Adol Christin Edition will also be released on September 28! The Adol Christin edition contains deluxe bonus items packaged inside a uniquely-designed Ys: X body bag, and the Digital Deluxe Edition includes a collection of bonus DLC in addition to the base game.


Title: Ys X: Nordics
Genre: Action RPG
Console: Nintendo Switch / PlayStation 5 / PlayStation 4
Release Date: September 28, 2023 (scheduled)
Languages
  Audio: Japanese
  Subtitles: Traditional Chinese/Korean 
Official Site: https://www.cloudedleopardent.com/game/ysx/zh/

© Nihon Falcom Corporation. All rights reserved.
Licensed to and published by Clouded Leopard Entertainment Inc.
